title: Riot  Keep an eye, please
body:
Please, someone nice, do not need to donate if you want ..., if someone wants to donate an account, why I lost 7 accounts, the important ones ... Bronze, PLatinum and a Gold, please riot, improve these hackers. ...



Keep an eye I do not want to accuse anyone and do not need to denounce anyone just giving a warning to you, take care

replies.body: You probably lost 7 accounts because they didn't belong to you.  :/  We don't support account [boosting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751834-MMR-Elo-Boosting), sharing, selling, donating, etc.  You've got to play fair and make the tough climb!  You don't have to do it alone, though.  Play with friends or check out [team recruitment](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment), but don't be coming in here looking for accounts.  I will come for you!  :P
Do not need to criticize just giving a warning and if you want to donate an unranked account I'm available, I do not force anyone to give my opinion
